questions.question: 1.Which of the following is false in generalization?

answers.a: a.If a parent class is an interface, it is represented by a dashed line with a white arrow
answers.b: b.If a parent class is an abstract class, it is represented by a solid line with a white arrow
answers.c: c.A parent is a class is represented by a solid line with a black arrow
answers.d: d.The hierarchies are represented by an arrow pointing downwards towards a child

questions.question: 2.Identify the valid is-a relationship from the list below: 1)Country 2)Germany 3)Europe 4)Asia 5)Continent 6)Asian country 7)India 8)City 9)European country 10)China 11)Tamilnadu
3.Which of the following best describes the UML diagram generation process for the 'Release a Vehicle' use case?

answers.a: a.It involves identifying the actors and their roles in the use case.
answers.b: b.It involves creating a graphical representation of the interactions between the actors and the system, in a chronological order.
answers.c: c.It involves documenting the requirements of the use case.
answers.d: d.It involves creating a visual representation of the system's architecture and components.
